name: Monochrome (Fachewachewa)
description:
A platformer with only one ability (jumping) and one level.

Simply reach the goal to win.

Oh and there's only one color too.

Controls: Arrow Keys, ZQSD or WASD to move and jump.

You can also jump with space if you prefer.

Headphones recommanded.

Made in a few hours for the GMTK Jam 2019.
